def_cn: 消除，驱散（痛苦、不愉快的回忆等）
def_en: If you exorcize a painful or unhappy memory, you succeed in removing it from your mind.

def_cn: （通过祈祷或宗教仪式）驱（邪），驱除（妖魔）
def_en: To exorcize an evil spirit or to exorcize a place or person means to force the spirit to leave the place or person by means of prayers and religious ceremonies.
